body_html: I am working on using tensor flow from java. I am approaching the problem by using jython and modifying the tensor flow cpython library to accomodate another python interpreter. the cpython should keep working flawlessly and my code is detecting if the interpreter is Jython and modifying the imports / modules to allow it to work. Underneath it uses the javacpp bindings for libtensorflow_cc.so. Is this something the google team would be open to have in the official repo ? @vrv
